Syntax

UCLASS (MinimalAPI, DisplayName="Motion Design Modifier Library")  
class UActorModifierCoreLibrary : public UBlueprintFunctionLibrary

Remarks

Blueprint Create/Read/Update/Delete operations for modifiers
